document.full_text: britney spears will begin a tour with spanish pop star enrique iglesias in june, the 29-year-old singer said on tuesday in an announcement coinciding with the release of her new album, "femme fatale."
document.title: britney spears to tour with enrique iglesias
lines_and_colors: britney spears will begin a tour with spanish pop star enrique iglesias in june, the 29-year-old singer said on tuesday in an announcement coinciding with the release of her new album, "femme fatale."
